name: Echoes of the Fractured Spiral
description: In a fractured galaxy, players embark on an odyssey to harmonize the competing factions, unearth hidden lore, and confront hidden dangers. With the galaxy's history as a backdrop, they strive to uncover the truth behind the enigmatic anomaly that threatens not only the galaxies salvation but its potential rebirth. This campaign blends exploration, intrigue, and moral dilemmas.

plot_outline.name: The Singing Echo
plot_outline.description: The players find themselves on the desolate planet of Sepheron where a mysterious signal of long-lost origins resonates. They are tasked to investigate the source, suspected to be a leftover node from the ancient Conclave of Echo.

allies.name: Ayla Neros
allies.description: Donned in worn leather with an array of scanning equipment strapped to her.
allies.backstory: Ayla is a shrewd archaeologist and a historian with expertise in the pre-Sundering era, driven by a personal vendetta against the Conclave for their hoarding of stellar secrets.

antagonists.name: Conclave Scout
antagonists.description: Adorned in tattered robes that glow faintly. They maintain a stoic vigilance, alert and analytical.

places.name: Sepheron Desert
places.description: Vast sandy coverage, littered with remnants of ancient machinery drowned beneath shifting dunes.
places.backstory: Once a bustling hub of research, the desert has fallen silent post-Sundering due to the decay of technology.

items.name: Echo Amplifier
items.description: A small device crafted from rusted parts, faintly humming with energy.
attributes: Enhances signal detection within a vast radius.
Requires skilled individuals to tune its frequencies correctly.
Prone to overheating under intensive operation.

plot_outline.name: The Hyperion Waypoint
plot_outline.description: The players arrive at Hyperion Station, a bustling hub used by traders and information brokers. They need to gather intelligence about the Conclave's movements.

allies.name: Threx
allies.description: A humanoid covered with iridescent scales, always wearing a satchel filled with datapads.
allies.backstory: As an information broker, Threx is neutral but leans towards those who can offer him exclusive data from pre-Sundering anomalies.

antagonists.name: The Mistfortunates Agent
antagonists.description: Decked in gear marked by wear, this agent prefers stealth and manipulation from the shadows.

places.name: Hyperion Station
places.description: A colossal, segmented structure brimming with species of all kinds, bustling with energetic frenzy.
places.backstory: Originally a military outpost, post-Sundering Hyperion has become a nexus for trade and espionage.

items.name: Galactic Credits
items.description: Metallic chips carrying faint inscriptions of an older time.
attributes: Currency widely accepted across the sectors.
Considered invaluable only in regions that respect the ancient imprints.
Can be exchanged for multiple commodities or information units.

plot_outline.name: Lost Embers
plot_outline.description: Navigating a decaying station lightly touched by solar storms, players unveil pent-up frustration from remnants of pirate factions who once worshiped AI deities.

allies.name: Genesis AI
allies.description: Restored from stasis; angular and sleek, alternating lights hum from its core.
allies.backstory: A relic of an age when AI sovereignty was revered. Its database holds forgotten codes to cease the anomalyâ€™s threat.
